title: A wartime Childhood, drug addiction and psychotherapy: The real, resilient Julie Andrews
text:
Sexual intercourse may have begun in 1963, along with the end of the Chatterley ban and the Beatles’ first LP, and no doubt other things besides, but the news never quite reached Julie Andrews, I always felt, who was in Hollywood shooting Mary Poppins at the time. Uniquely among major stars, she had no erotic heat. When she played prim and starchy governesses, the P L Travers one plus Maria von Trapp, there was never any sense of a lurking minx, waiting to burst forth. It’s horrible, in the movie S.O.B., where she is made to flash her breasts. Her screen kisses have always been, in her words, “very respectful”.

There are elements of this prudishness, even squeamishness, throughout her autobiography....
description: Sexual intercourse may have begun in 1963, along with the end of the Chatterley ban and the Beatles’ first LP, and no doubt other things besides, but the news never quite reached Julie Andrews, I always felt, who was in Hollywood shooting Mary Poppins at the time.
